front.title: Use cases, Network Scenarios and gap analysis for Packet Optical Integration (POI) with programmable pluggables under ACTN Framework

abstract.t: This document provides general overarching guidelines for control and management of packet over optical converged networks with programmable pluggables and focuses on operators' use cases and network scenarios. It provides a set of use cases which are needed for the control and management of the packet over optical networks which comprise devices with mixes of packet and optical functions where the optical functions may be provided on programmable pluggables. The document provides a gap analysis to solve the use cases.
